## Describe the data

This "bird" data includes the some value related to birds livestock animals (number of chickens, ducks, goose?) of 248 countries/regions all over the world from 1961 to 2018. 

It is consisted of 30977 rows and 14 columns.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
print(dim(bird_data))# count of columns and rows
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 30977    14
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
n_country <- length(unique(bird_data$Area))
print(n_country)
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] 248
```
:::
:::

This data includes 4 numeric data and the below table shows their basic statistics information

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
summary(bird_data) # View the basic statistics information of each variables
```
